description: Updates the outbound call config of a campaign. This API is idempotent.

parameters.name: answerMachineDetectionConfig
parameters.description: Answering Machine Detection config Enable or disable answering machine detection awaitAnswerMachinePrompt (boolean) --- Enable or disable await answer machine prompt.

nested_params.name: enableAnswerMachineDetection
nested_params.description: Enable or disable answering machine detection.

nested_params.name: awaitAnswerMachinePrompt
nested_params.description: Enable or disable await answer machine prompt.
